root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 15-4-2, translated into en
root.data: The indicator is aggregated to the regional and global level by, in the case of sub-indicator 15.4.2a, summing the spatial extent of green cover and total mountain area, and in the case of 15.4.2b, summing the spatial extent of degraded over total mountain area for all countries and territories reporting in a specific region or globally.
